title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.12 - Approved boilers and boiler components
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.12 - Approved boilers and boiler components

State Regulations

Boilers and boiler components are not required to be
approved. A voluntarily approved boiler or boiler component, however, which is
in all material respects in compliance with the resolution of approval shall
constitute one in compliance with the Industrial Code, any provision thereof
inconsistent with the resolution of approval notwithstanding. Special
conditions and requirements set forth in a resolution of approval shall be
compiled with. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-1.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
